spec.title: WebVTT: The Web Video Text Tracks Format

selectors.name: ::cue
selectors.prose: The ::cue pseudo-element (with no argument) matches any list of WebVTT Node Objects constructed for the matched element, with the exception that the properties corresponding to the background shorthand must be applied to the WebVTT cue background box rather than the list of WebVTT Node Objects.

selectors.name: :past
selectors.prose: The :past pseudo-class only matches WebVTT Node Objects that are in the past.

selectors.name: :future
selectors.prose: The :future pseudo-class only matches WebVTT Node Objects that are in the future.

selectors.name: ::cue-region
selectors.prose: The ::cue-region pseudo-element (with no argument) matches any list of WebVTT region objects constructed for the matched element.
